<em>&nbsp;<em>

[![BudgetNode](https://budgetnode.com/images/logo.png)](https://budgetnode.com)  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

**[BudgetNode](https://budgetnode.com)** is a brand of Access Internet Ltd (Company Number: _10219199_).  

Our aim is to provide good quality services and support without the high price tag.  

All services come with a 7 day money back guarantee if the service is not as described. We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Card (via 2Checkout), and Bitcoin.  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

We offer our services in US East (Ashburn & Atlanta), US West (Los Angeles), and Europe (Netherlands).  

<em>&nbsp;<em>


To celebrate this cyber week, use promo code **CYBERWEEK** for 50% off any public plan on our [website](https://budgetnode.com). Promo expires _5th December 2016_.  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

We'll double the RAM or BANDWIDTH of any OpenVZ plan using promo code **DOUBLE**. Promo expires _5th December 2016_. Due to large amount of orders, please open a ticket to claim upgrade.

<em>&nbsp;<em>

Unmetered bandwidth is available in Netherlands (KVM) for an additional $5/month. FUP & ToS applies.

<em>&nbsp;<em>

__________
**Features**
-

* 100Mbps or 1Gbps Port Speed (depending on plan)
* Free Internal/Private Network
* Delegated IPv4 Space
* Delegated IPv6 Space
* DDoS Protected Networks
* Edge firewall rules possible (block or ratelimit protocols). 
* Instant Provisioning (subject to fraud screening)
* SolusVM Control Panel
* Instant rDNS Control
* TUN/TAP, PPP, GRE, FUSE, & SIT Support
* Custom ISOs right from the panel (**KVM**)
* OS Templates: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, OpenSUSE, Scientific Linux, Linux Mint & Desktop Environments

__________
**Hardware**
-

We provision services on various different configurations:

* E3 v1/v2/v3+, Dual E5v2/v4, Dual L5639/40
* 32GB, 64GB, 72GB, 128GB, 256GB+ DDR3/DDR4 ECC RAM
* Enterprise 4 x 2TB SATA-3 6Gb/s Drives in RAID10
* Supermicro 4-bay Hotswap Chassis  
<em>&nbsp;<em>
__________
